name: RBGY (itch)
description:
I used to be working on this game in Scratch, but I've now started porting it to Unity to give myself more creative freedom! So far it's only available on Windows because the Unity version is EXTREMELY early in development. Once I have a considerable amount more progress though, I'll start making it available on more platforms.

If you want to see what the Scratch version was like, click here!
